trends: There have been 158 other sightings in Portland
There were no other sightings in Portland on or around December 23rd 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile standing in Fernhill park on my lunch break, talking on the phone, looking at the sky and stars, which is typical for me when the weather allows, I observed a large, glowing, bright white object appear to fall or decend from the sky in the east. It happened very quickly, about as fast as it takes to watch a shooting star and it reminded me of watching the same, although I know this was no shooting star or meteor, which I have seen plently of. I first noticed the object at about the level of the tree line, it quickly decended out of sight & I had the thought that it had landed somewhere. The object was roughly one and a half to two times the size of the airplanes that were flying nearby. I am unable to accuratly judge the distance that it was from me, but I am assuming it was a few miles or more, considering the size relevant to the nearby airplanes that I am sure were further away than it. I felt amazed and somewhat in shock at seeing this, so much so that I commented to the person I was talking to on the phone "I don't know what I just saw, but I know that wasn't normal" I then proceded to explain the phenomenon I had just witnessed while continuing to watch the sky for another appearance, which was not forthcoming. This occured on the evening of December 23rd between 5:15-5:20pm and I continued to watch the sky until 5:35 when I had to return to work.
Summary: Standing in the park on my break I observed a large, bright white glowing object decend & appear to land at an unknown distance
